name: Berserker and Thumbnail Maker
description:
Controls

  • A [Left], D [Right] : Move
  • W [Up]: Jump
  • [Space]: Create/insert thumbnail
  • R: Restart level

Created for Weekly Game Jam 184: Thumb War.

Credits

  • Environment tileset

Music

  • gameMusic.wav

Sound

  • Pack
  • die.wav
  • dig.wav
  • electricity.wav
  • exit.wav
  • jump.wav
  • punch.wav
  • shutter.wav
  • stutter.wav
  • plop.wav

Software

  • Created with Haxe, Heaps.io, deepnightLibs, and GIMP.
